title: Ryan
description: RYANShe was perfect: Sweet, smart, awkwardly adorable, and beautiful as hell. The only problem was:she was terrified to leave her apartment. And, apparently, she had somehow gotten herself wrapped up with some pretty bad guys to boot.DUSTY He was perfect:He was a living, breathing, walking, talking statue come to life.But when would a man like that ever want to be with a woman who was too anxious to even walk into the hallway? Let alone go on a date with him. Or meet the family he was so close with. That being said, he seemed interested for some reason.So obviously, he was just as crazy as I was. On top of that whole confusion situation, something was going on with my business partners. And things were about to go straight to hellâ€¦* For possible triggers, please visit: http://www.jessicagadziala.com/trigge...
author: Jessica Gadziala
